__e: Fine, but why didn't you do it earlier?
How could you do that to me? I was only eight, just a little kid.
So, what didn't you wanna talk to me on the phone about?
Couldn't have put any of this in a letter, I suppose?
To have him assassinate in daylight, you were really out of your mind!
All right. And as far as the... the cell phone, the video's not retrievable. You guys couldn't get anything out of that?
So, how'd you guys know I was in here, anyway?
